item.title: Report X-2025010036
item.description:
Report X-2025010036

Identified by scraper @ 2025-01-07T00:58:33+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-12-13
  • City: GOODYEAR
  • State: AZ
  • Report Type: Undeclared Shipment with no Release
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: UNITED PARCEL SERVICE
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: NOTIFIED ABOUT A LEAKING PACKAGE AND A RESPONDER BROUGHT A PACKAGE BACK TO THE PSC FOR PROCESSING. UPON OPENING THE PACKAGE RESPONDER NOTICED IT WAS FULL OF 5PK NICOTINE VAPES. RESPONDER DID A 6 SIDED CHECK AND NOTICED NO DIAMOND LABELS OR HAZMAT INFORMATION ON PACKAGE AND NOTIFIED RMP ABOUT A POSSIBLE UNDECLARED. LITHIUM ION BATTERIES CONTAINED IN EQUIPMENT

item.title: Report E-2025010041
item.description:
Report E-2025010041

Identified by scraper @ 2025-01-07T00:58:33+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-12-05
  • City: PHOENIX
  • State: AZ
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: XPO LOGISTICS, LLC
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: At 0649 ET, UPH notified ERTS of a saturated carton of UN1760, Betco Emulsinator released inside of its carton. The spill was contained to the carton inside of the trailer. The caller and Senior Assistant Service Center Manager approved terminal personnel to clean and manage spill. Waste will be containerized inside of a 10-gallon DF. Per the Bill of lading, Chemtrec was notified and provided report #2024120500033.
